name: Sentinel - Holiday Special
description:
Welcome to the Sentinel holiday special! This is a short, interactive story featuring scenes with all the ROs, as both a Christmas gift and a thank to you everyone who's shown interest in, or supported, this project.

To play, just hit 'Run Game' in the window above. If you encounter any bugs or issues running the file, get in touch on Tumblr or leave a comment on this page, and I'll see what I can do.

Stay safe, and best wishes!
